price: Your Lord inspired the bees, “Make homes in the mountains, the trees, and in the trellises that people put up,
arabic: وَأَوۡحَىٰ رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلنَّحۡلِ أَنِ ٱتَّخِذِي مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتٗا وَمِنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ وَمِمَّا يَعۡرِشُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
